Articles.Content:
Dear Kerban Pilot,

Kerban Carriers Ltd. is proud to bring you the KF-9 Sundog. A multipurpose atmospheric craft, the Sundog is perfect for a variety of roles. Our dual jet technology allows us to give the KF-9 a set of engines capable of performing like basic jet engines at low altitude and turbojet engines at high altitude. The Sundog's large wingspan gives it the airlift capability to pack a truly massive punch for the martial kerban in all of us as well as extra tanks for the practical side. Each KF-9 comes with a pair of parachutes standard, allowing for absurdly short landings to match it's equally short takeoffs. Kerban Carriers Ltd. has tested the Sundog at altitudes over 30,000 meters and clocked it at over 2,100 mps. All of this combines into a package that we here at Kerban Carriers Ltd. are sure will become the workhorse of every discerning Kerban's airwing in no time.

Place your purchase order here (download). Please read the owners manual included in the purchase for proper flight procedures.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kf-9-sundog/

For your viewing pleasure, Kerban Carriers has included several photos taken of the Sundog in action and a close up of it's smoothly contoured tail!

Edited November 18, 2013 by barrenwaste
